mapper.select: /* intrEmpInqy1010 : 사원 인덱스 채번 */ SELECT 'EMP_' || LPAD(NVL(MAX(REPLACE(EMP_IDX,'EMP_')),0) + 1,4,0) AS SEQUENCE_ID FROM EMP_INFO

/* intrEmpInqy1011 : 사원 목록 조회 */ SELECT SUB_DATA.* FROM ( SELECT E.EMP_IDX , E.ORG_CD , O.ORG_NM , E.RANK_CD , R.RANK_NM , E.EMP_NM , E.IS_MALE , SUBSTR(E.MOB_NO, 1, 3) || '-' || SUBSTR(E.MOB_NO, 4, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(E.MOB_NO, 8, 4) AS MOB_NO , E.ADDR , E.ADDR_INFO , E.EMAIL , E.EMP_ID , E.EMP_PWD , E.HIRE_DT , E.LEAV_DT , RANK() OVER(ORDER BY E.HIRE_DT DESC, E.EMP_IDX DESC) AS NUM , COUNT(E.EMP_IDX) OVER() AS LIST_CNT , CASE WHEN E.LEAV_DT IS NOT NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END LEAV_YN FROM EMP_INFO E LEFT OUTER JOIN ORG O ON O.ORG_CD = E.ORG_CD AND O.USE_YN = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN RANK R ON R.RANK_CD = E.RANK_CD AND R.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE 1=1
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(E.EMP_NM),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','') LIKE '%'||REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(#{srchNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','')||'%'
AND E.HIRE_DT >= REPLACE(#{srchSdt, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'-','')
AND E.HIRE_DT <= REPLACE(#{srchEdt, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'-','')
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(O.ORG_NM),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','') LIKE '%'||REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(#{orgNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','')||'%'
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(R.RANK_NM),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','') LIKE '%'||REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(#{rankNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','')||'%'
AND E.LEAV_DT IS NULL
AND E.LEAV_DT IS NOT NULL
) SUB_DATA WHERE 1=1
AND SUB_DATA.NUM BETWEEN #{sIdx, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND #{eIdx, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY SUB_DATA.EMP_IDX ASC

/* intrEmpInqy1013 : 관리자 계정 조회 */ SELECT EMP_IDX , ORG_CD , RANK_CD , EMP_NM , IS_MALE , MOB_NO , ADDR , ADDR_INFO , EMAIL , EMP_ID , EMP_PWD , HIRE_DT , LEAV_DT FROM EMP_INFO WHERE UPPER(EMP_ID) = 'ADMIN'
/* intrEmpInqy1021 : 부서 목록 조회 */ SELECT ORG_CD , ORG_NM , UPPR_ORG_CD , USE_YN , DISP_ORDER , REMARK FROM ORG ORDER BY DISP_ORDER ASC
/* intrEmpInqy1022 : 직급 목록 조회 */ SELECT RANK_CD , RANK_NM , USE_YN , DISP_ORDER , REMARK FROM RANK ORDER BY DISP_ORDER ASC

/* intrEmpInqy1023 : 부서 목록 (전체) 조회 */ SELECT DATA.* FROM ( SELECT '' AS ORG_CD , '전체' AS ORG_NM , '' AS UPPR_ORG_CD , 'Y' AS USE_YN , '0' AS DISP_ORDER , '' AS REMARK FROM DUAL UNION SELECT ORG_CD , ORG_NM , UPPR_ORG_CD , USE_YN , DISP_ORDER , REMARK FROM ORG WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' ) DATA ORDER BY DATA.DISP_ORDER ASC

/* intrEmpInqy1031 : 사원 상세 조회 */ SELECT E.EMP_IDX , E.ORG_CD , O.ORG_NM , E.RANK_CD , R.RANK_NM , E.EMP_NM , E.IS_MALE , SUBSTR(E.MOB_NO, 1, 3) || '-' || SUBSTR(E.MOB_NO, 4, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(E.MOB_NO, 8, 4) AS MOB_NO , E.ADDR , E.ADDR_INFO , E.EMAIL , E.EMP_ID , E.EMP_PWD , E.HIRE_DT , E.LEAV_DT , CASE WHEN E.LEAV_DT IS NOT NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END LEAV_YN FROM EMP_INFO E LEFT OUTER JOIN ORG O ON O.ORG_CD = E.ORG_CD AND O.USE_YN = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN RANK R ON R.RANK_CD = E.RANK_CD AND R.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE E.EMP_IDX = #{empIdx, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

/* intrEmpInqy2021 : 사원 아이디 중복 조회 */ SELECT EMP_IDX , ORG_CD , RANK_CD , EMP_NM , IS_MALE , MOB_NO , ADDR , ADDR_INFO , EMAIL , EMP_ID , EMP_PWD , HIRE_DT , LEAV_DT FROM EMP_INFO WHERE UPPER(EMP_ID) = UPPER(#{empId, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

/* intrEmpInqy2041 : 부서 사원 수 조회 */ SELECT O.ORG_NM , COUNT(E.EMP_NM) AS ORG_CNT FROM ORG O LEFT OUTER JOIN EMP_INFO E ON E.ORG_CD = O.ORG_CD AND O.USE_YN = 'Y' AND E.LEAV_DT IS NULL GROUP BY O.ORG_NM, O.ORG_CD, O.REG_DT ORDER BY ORG_NM ASC

/* intrEmpInqy2042 : 인사 요약 */ SELECT ( SELECT COUNT(E.EMP_IDX) || '명' FROM EMP_INFO E WHERE E.LEAV_DT IS NULL ) AS NEW_CNT , ( SELECT COUNT(E.EMP_IDX) || '명' FROM EMP_INFO E WHERE E.LEAV_DT IS NOT NULL ) AS LEAV_CNT , ( SELECT COUNT(E.EMP_IDX) || '명' FROM EMP_INFO E WHERE 1=1 ) AS EMP_CNT FROM DUAL
mapper.update: /* "intrEmpProc1031" : 사원 복직, 퇴사 처리 */ UPDATE EMP_INFO SET LEAV_DT = CASE WHEN LEAV_DT IS NULL THEN TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') ELSE NULL END WHERE EMP_IDX = #{empIdx, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
